text: The Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations is the deputy to the Secretary-General of the United Nations. It was created by the General Assembly at the end of 1997. ==List== Deputy Secretary-General Portrait Country Term Secretary-General 1 Louise FréchetteLouise Fréchette 2 March 1998 – 1 April 2006 Kofi Annan 2 Mark Malloch BrownMark Malloch Brown 1 April 2006 – 31 December 2006 Kofi Annan 3 Asha-Rose MigiroAsha-Rose Migiro 5 February 2007 – 1 July 2012 Ban Ki-moon 4 Jan EliassonJan Eliasson 1 July 2012 – 31 December 2016 Ban Ki-moon 5 Amina J. MohammedAmina J. Mohammed 1 January 2017 – present António Guterres ==References==
title: Deputy Secretary-General of the United Nations
